artifact.name: create_worksheet
artifact.description: Create a worksheet with a given name

artifact.name: import_csv
artifact.description: Import CSV data into a worksheet

artifact.name: username_login
artifact.description: Log in to the google account with username and password

artifact.name: search_cell
artifact.description: Search a cell with a given string

artifact.name: delete_worksheet
artifact.description: Delete an entire worksheet with its data

artifact.name: get_all_spreadsheets
artifact.description: Retrieve all spreadsheets for a particular google account

artifact.name: get_all_worksheets
artifact.description: Retrieve all worksheets for a given spreadsheet

artifact.name: update_worksheet_metadata
artifact.description: Update metadata of a given worksheet

artifact.name: get_all_cells
artifact.description: Retrieve all cells with data for a given worksheet

artifact.name: get_all_cells_csv
artifact.description: Retrieve all cells with data for a given worksheet in csv format

artifact.name: get_authors
artifact.description: Retrieve authors of a given spreadsheet or worksheet

artifact.name: get_cell_range
artifact.description: Retrieve cells containing data for a given cell range

artifact.name: get_cell_range_csv
artifact.description: Retrieve cells containing data for a given cell range in csv format

artifact.name: get_column_headers
artifact.description: Retrieve column headers for a given worksheet

artifact.name: set_row
artifact.description: Set a specific row with the given data
